tags.name: Folders
tags.description: Controller to handle all REST calls against folders.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: assignedToFilter
parameters.description: Approvals assigned to this user.

parameters.name: statusFilter
parameters.description: Approvals with this status. Default is 'pending'.

values.description: Indicates the approval does not have the status set.

parameters.name: releaseIdsFilter
parameters.description: Approvals for release id(s) mentioned in the filter. Multiple releases can be mentioned by separating them with ',' e.g. releaseIdsFilter=1,2,3,4.

parameters.name: typeFilter
parameters.description: Approval with this type.

values.description: Indicates the approval type does not set.
Indicates the approvals which executed before deployment.
Indicates the approvals which executed after deployment.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of approvals to get. Default is 50.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the approvals after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order of created approvals. Default is 'descending'.

parameters.name: includeMyGroupApprovals
parameters.description: 'true' to include my group approvals. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ReleaseApproval object having status, approver and comments.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: approvalId
parameters.description: Id of the approval.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: release definition object to create.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

get.description: Get a list of release definitions.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Get release definitions with names containing searchText.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The properties that should be expanded in the list of Release definitions.

values.description: Returns top level properties of object.
Include last release in return object.

parameters.name: artifactType
parameters.description: Release definitions with given artifactType will be returned. Values can be Build, Jenkins, GitHub, Nuget, Team Build (external), ExternalTFSBuild, Git, TFVC, ExternalTfsXamlBuild.

parameters.name: artifactSourceId
parameters.description: Release definitions with given artifactSourceId will be returned. e.g. For build it would be {projectGuid}:{BuildDefinitionId}, for Jenkins it would be {JenkinsConnectionId}:{JenkinsDefinitionId}, for TfsOnPrem it would be {TfsOnPremConnectionId}:{ProjectName}:{TfsOnPremDefinitionId}. For third-party artifacts e.g. TeamCity, BitBucket you may refer 'uniqueSourceIdentifier' inside vss-extension.json at https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-rm-extensions/blob/master/Extensions.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of release definitions to get.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the release definitions after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order. Default is 'IdAscending'.

values.description: Return results based on release definition Id ascending order.
Return results based on release definition Id descending order.
Return results based on release definition name ascending order.
Return results based on release definition name descending order.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Gets the release definitions under the specified path.

parameters.name: isExactNameMatch
parameters.description: 'true'to gets the release definitions with exact match as specified in searchText. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: tagFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of tags. Only release definitions with these tags will be returned.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release Definitions will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included. Note that this will not filter out any Release Definition from results irrespective of whether it has property set or not.

parameters.name: definitionIdFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of release definitions to retrieve.

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: 'true' to get release definitions that has been deleted. Default is 'false'

parameters.name: searchTextContainsFolderName
parameters.description: 'true' to get the release definitions under the folder with name as specified in searchText. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Release definition object to update.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: skipTasksValidation
parameters.description: Skip task validation boolean flag

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Id of the release definition.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Comment for deleting a release definition.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: 'true' to automatically cancel any in-progress release deployments and proceed with release definition deletion . Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Id of the release definition.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release Definition will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included.

parameters.name: includeDisabled
parameters.description: Boolean flag to include disabled definitions.

get.description: Get revision history for a release definition

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Id of the definition.

get.description: Get release definition for a given definitionId and revision

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Id of the definition.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: Id of the revision.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: List the deployments for a given definition id.

parameters.name: definitionEnvironmentId
parameters.description: List the deployments for a given definition environment id.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: List the deployments for which deployments are created as identity specified.

parameters.name: minModifiedTime
parameters.description: List the deployments with LastModified time >= minModifiedTime.

parameters.name: maxModifiedTime
parameters.description: List the deployments with LastModified time <= maxModifiedTime.

parameters.name: deploymentStatus
parameters.description: List the deployments with given deployment status. Default is 'All'.

values.description: The deployment status is not deployed.
The deployment status is in progress.

parameters.name: operationStatus
parameters.description: List the deployments with given operation status. Default is 'All'.

values.description: The deployment operation status is undefined.
The deployment operation status is queued.
The deployment operation status is scheduled.
The deployment operation status is pending.
The deployment operation status is approved.
The deployment operation status is rejected.
The deployment operation status is deferred.
The deployment operation status is queued for agent.
The deployment operation status is phase in progress.
The deployment operation status is phase succeeded.
The deployment operation status is phase partially succeeded.
The deployment operation status is phase failed.
The deployment operation status is canceled.
The deployment operation status is phase canceled.
The deployment operation status is manualintervention pending.
The deployment operation status is queued for pipeline.
The deployment operation status is cancelling.
The deployment operation status is EvaluatingGates.
The deployment operation status is GateFailed.
The deployment operation status is all.

parameters.name: latestAttemptsOnly
parameters.description: 'true' to include deployments with latest attempt only. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: List the deployments with given query order. Default is 'Descending'.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: List the deployments with given top. Default top is '50' and Max top is '100'.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: List the deployments with deployment id >= continuationToken.

parameters.name: createdFor
parameters.description: List the deployments for which deployments are requested as identity specified.

parameters.name: minStartedTime
parameters.description: List the deployments with StartedOn time >= minStartedTime.

parameters.name: maxStartedTime
parameters.description: List the deployments with StartedOn time <= maxStartedTime.

parameters.name: sourceBranch
parameters.description: List the deployments that are deployed from given branch name.

parameters.name: path

values.description: Order by folder name and path ascending.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.description: Metadata to patch the Release Gates.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: gateStepId
parameters.description: Gate step Id.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Releases from this release definition Id.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Releases with names containing searchText.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Releases created by this user.

parameters.name: statusFilter
parameters.description: Releases that have this status.

parameters.name: minCreatedTime
parameters.description: Releases that were created after this time.

parameters.name: maxCreatedTime
parameters.description: Releases that were created before this time.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order of created date for releases. Default is descending.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of releases to get. Default is 50.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the releases after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The property that should be expanded in the list of releases.

parameters.name: artifactTypeId
parameters.description: Releases with given artifactTypeId will be returned. Values can be Build, Jenkins, GitHub, Nuget, Team Build (external), ExternalTFSBuild, Git, TFVC, ExternalTfsXamlBuild.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the artifact used. e.g. For build it would be {projectGuid}:{BuildDefinitionId}, for Jenkins it would be {JenkinsConnectionId}:{JenkinsDefinitionId}, for TfsOnPrem it would be {TfsOnPremConnectionId}:{ProjectName}:{TfsOnPremDefinitionId}. For third-party artifacts e.g. TeamCity, BitBucket you may refer 'uniqueSourceIdentifier' inside vss-extension.json https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-rm-extensions/blob/master/Extensions.

parameters.name: artifactVersionId
parameters.description: Releases with given artifactVersionId will be returned. E.g. in case of Build artifactType, it is buildId.

parameters.name: sourceBranchFilter
parameters.description: Releases with given sourceBranchFilter will be returned (Not to be used with environmentStatusFilter).

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: Gets the soft deleted releases, if true.

parameters.name: tagFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of tags. Only releases with these tags will be returned.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Releases will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included. Note that this will not filter out any Release from results irrespective of whether it has property set or not.

parameters.name: releaseIdFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of releases Ids. Only releases with these Ids will be returned.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Releases under this folder path will be returned

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.description: Metadata to create a release.

parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: Id of the release.

parameters.name: approvalFilters
parameters.description: A filter which would allow fetching approval steps selectively based on whether it is automated, or manual. This would also decide whether we should fetch pre and post approval snapshots. Assumes All by default

values.description: Manual approval steps but no approval snapshots (Use with ApprovalSnapshots for snapshots).
Automated approval steps but no approval snapshots (Use with ApprovalSnapshots for snapshots).
No approval steps, but approval snapshots (Use with either ManualApprovals or AutomatedApprovals for approval steps).
All approval steps and approval snapshots.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: A property that should be expanded in the release.

values.description: Return top level properties of object.

parameters.name: $topGateRecords
parameters.description: Number of release gate records to get. Default is 5.

parameters.name: includeDisabledDefinitions
parameters.description: Include disabled definitions (if set to 'false' returns error, default is 'true')

alias.description: Gets or sets the artifact definition alias.

artifactType.description: Gets or sets the artifact type.

details.description: Gets or sets the artifact definition details.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of artifact definition.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of artifact definition.

deploymentInput.description: Gets and sets the agent job deployment input

agentSpecification.description: Specification for an agent on which a job gets executed.

imageId.description: Gets or sets the image ID.

parallelExecution.description: Gets or sets the parallel execution input.

AgentPoolQueueReference.description: Represents a reference to an agent queue.

id.description: The ID of the queue.

AgentSpecification.description: Specification of the agent defined by the pool provider.

autoTriggeredAndPreviousEnvironmentAppro.description: Specify whether the approval can be skipped if the same approver approved the previous stage.

enforceIdentityRevalidation.description: Specify whether revalidate identity of approver before completing the approval.

values.description: Approvals shown after successful execution of gates.
Approvals shown always after execution of gates.

releaseCreatorCanBeApprover.description: Specify whether the user requesting a release or deployment should allow to approver.

requiredApproverCount.description: The number of approvals required to move release forward. '0' means all approvals required.

timeoutInMinutes.description: Approval timeout. Approval default timeout is 30 days. Maximum allowed timeout is 365 days. '0' means default timeout i.e 30 days.

definitionReference.description: Gets or sets definition reference. e.g. {"project":{"id":"fed755ea-49c5-4399-acea-fd5b5aa90a6c","name":"myProject"},"definition":{"id":"1","name":"mybuildDefinition"},"connection":{"id":"1","name":"myConnection"}}.

isPrimary.description: Indicates whether artifact is primary or not.

isRetained.description: Indicates whether artifact is retained by release or not.

type.description: Gets or sets type. It can have value as 'Build', 'Jenkins', 'GitHub', 'Nuget', 'Team Build (external)', 'ExternalTFSBuild', 'Git', 'TFVC', 'ExternalTfsXamlBuild'.

alias.description: Gets or sets the alias of artifact.

artifactDownloadMode.description: Gets or sets the name of artifact definition. Valid values are 'Skip', 'Selective', 'All'.

artifactItems.description: Gets or sets the artifact items of the input.

artifactType.description: Gets or sets the type of artifact.

createReleaseOnBuildTagging.description: Gets or sets whether a release should be created on build tagging.

sourceBranch.description: Gets or sets the branch for the filter.

tagFilter.description: Gets or sets the regex based tag filter.

tags.description: Gets or sets the list of tags for the filter.

useBuildDefinitionBranch.description: Gets or sets whether filter should default to build definition branch.

instanceReference.description: Sets instance reference of artifact. e.g. for build artifact it is build number.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of artifact provider.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of artifact provider.

sourceUri.description: Gets or sets the link of artifact provider.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of artifact provider.

artifactTypeId.description: Gets or sets the artifact type of artifact source.

sourceIdInputs.description: Gets or sets the list of sourceIdInput of artifact source.

artifactSourceIds.description: Gets or sets the list of artifactsourceIds.

id.description: ID of the artifact source.

artifactAlias.description: Artifact source alias for Artifact Source trigger type

isTriggerSupported.description: Gets or sets the whether trigger is supported or not.

isTriggerSupportedOnlyInHosted.description: Gets or sets the whether trigger is supported only on hosted environment.

isWebhookSupportedAtServerLevel.description: Gets or sets the whether webhook is supported at server level.

payloadHashHeaderName.description: Gets or sets the payload hash header name for the artifact trigger configuration.

resources.description: Gets or sets the resources for artifact trigger configuration.

webhookPayloadMapping.description: Gets or sets the webhook payload mapping for artifact trigger configuration.

artifactTriggerConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the artifact trigger configuration of artifact type definition.

artifactType.description: Gets or sets the artifact type of artifact type definition. Valid values are 'Build', 'Package', 'Source' or 'ContainerImage'.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of artifact type definition.

endpointTypeId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint type id of artifact type definition.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets the input descriptors of artifact type definition.

isCommitsTraceabilitySupported.description: Gets or sets the is commits tracebility supported value of artifact type defintion.

isWorkitemsTraceabilitySupported.description: Gets or sets the is workitems tracebility supported value of artifact type defintion.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of artifact type definition.

uniqueSourceIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the unique source identifier of artifact type definition.

alias.description: Gets or sets the alias of artifact.

defaultVersion.description: Gets or sets the default version of artifact.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message encountered during querying of versions for artifact.

versions.description: Gets or sets the list of build versions of artifact.

artifactVersions.description: Gets or sets the list for artifact versions of artifact version query result.

lastRefreshedOn.description: Gets or sets last refreshed time.

serviceEndpointId.description: Gets or sets the service endpoint ID.

vault.description: Gets or sets the vault name.

contentType.description: Gets or sets the content type of key vault variable value.

enabled.description: Indicates the vault variable value enabled or not.

expires.description: Gets or sets the expire time of key vault variable value.

condition.description: Gets or sets the job condition.

jobCancelTimeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the job cancel timeout in minutes for deployment which are cancelled by user for this release environment.

overrideInputs.description: Gets or sets the override inputs.

timeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the job execution timeout in minutes for deployment which are queued against this release environment.

commitMessage.description: Gets or sets the commit message for the artifact.

definitionId.description: Gets or sets the definition id.

definitionName.description: Gets or sets the definition name.

id.description: Gets or sets the build id.

isMultiDefinitionType.description: Gets or sets if the artifact supports multiple definitions.

name.description: Gets or sets the build number.

sourceBranch.description: Gets or sets the source branch for the artifact.

sourcePullRequestVersion.description: Gets or sets the source pull request version for the artifact.

sourceRepositoryId.description: Gets or sets the repository id for the artifact.

sourceRepositoryType.description: Gets or sets the repository type for the artifact.

sourceVersion.description: Gets or sets the source version for the artifact.

Change.description: Represents a change associated with a build.

displayUri.description: The location of a user-friendly representation of the resource.

id.description: Something that identifies the change. For a commit, this would be the SHA1. For a TFVC changeset, this would be the changeset id.

location.description: The location of the full representation of the resource.

message.description: A description of the change. This might be a commit message or changeset description.

pushedBy.description: The person or process that pushed the change.

id.description: Check configuration Id of generated gate.

resourceName.description: Name of the resource for which gate was generated.

resourceType.description: Type of the resource for which the gate was generated.

version.description: Version of the check configuration gate was generated with.

id.description: Id of the resource.

repositoryReference.description: Gets and sets the repository references.

checkForCredentialsAndOtherSecrets.description: Scan the release definition for secrets

conditionType.description: Gets or sets the condition type.

values.description: The condition type is environment state.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the condition. e.g. 'ReleaseStarted'.

value.description: Gets or set value of the condition.

allowOverride.description: Gets and sets if a variable can be overridden at deployment time or not.

isSecret.description: Gets or sets as variable is secret or not.

value.description: Gets and sets value of the configuration variable.

tagFilters.description: List tag filters applied while trigger.

continueOnError.description: Indicates whether to continue job on error or not.

enabled.description: Indicates the job enabled or not.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Pagination format supported by this data source(ContinuationToken/SkipTop).

initialContextTemplate.description: Defines the initial value of the query params

parameters.description: Parameters of the datasource.

requestContent.description: Gets or sets http request body

requestVerb.description: Gets or sets http request verb

resultSelector.description: Result selector applied on output of datasource result, for example jsonpath:$.value[?(@.properties.isEnabled == true)].

resultTemplate.description: Format of the return results, for example. { "Value" : "{{{id}}}", "DisplayValue" : "{{{name}}}" }.

DataSourceBindingBase.description: Represents binding of data source for the service endpoint request.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Pagination format supported by this data source(ContinuationToken/SkipTop).

dataSourceName.description: Gets or sets the name of the data source.

endpointId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint Id.

endpointUrl.description: Gets or sets the url of the service endpoint.

headers.description: Gets or sets the authorization headers.

initialContextTemplate.description: Defines the initial value of the query params

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters for the data source.

requestContent.description: Gets or sets http request body

requestVerb.description: Gets or sets http request verb

resultSelector.description: Gets or sets the result selector.

name.description: Gets and sets the name of deploy phase.

values.description: Phase type not defined. Don't use this.
Phase type which contains tasks executed on agent.

refName.description: Gets and sets the reference name of deploy phase.

workflowTasks.description: Gets and sets the workflow tasks for the deploy phase.

EnvironmentExecutionPolicy.description: Defines policy on environment queuing at Release Management side queue. We will send to Environment Runner [creating pre-deploy and other steps] only when the policies mentioned are satisfied.

concurrencyCount.description: This policy decides, how many environments would be with Environment Runner.

queueDepthCount.description: Queue depth in the EnvironmentQueue table, this table keeps the environment entries till Environment Runner is free [as per it's policy] to take another environment for running.

autoLinkWorkItems.description: Gets and sets as the auto link workitems or not.

badgeEnabled.description: Gets and sets as the badge enabled or not.

publishDeploymentStatus.description: Gets and sets as the publish deployment status or not.

pullRequestDeploymentEnabled.description: Gets and sets as the.pull request deployment enabled or not.

daysToKeep.description: Gets and sets the number of days to keep environment.

releasesToKeep.description: Gets and sets the number of releases to keep.

retainBuild.description: Gets and sets as the build to be retained or not.

definitionEnvironmentId.description: Definition environment ID on which this trigger applicable.

releaseDefinitionId.description: ReleaseDefinition ID on which this trigger applicable.

triggerContent.description: Gets or sets the trigger content.

triggerType.description: Gets or sets the trigger type.

values.description: Environment trigger type is deployment group redeploy.

eventTypes.description: Gets or sets list of event types.

parallelExecutionType.description: Parallel execution type, for example MultiConfiguration or MultiMachine.

data.description: Application specific data for the entry.

id.description: Unique Id of the entry.

type.description: Application specific favorite entry type. Empty or Null represents that Favorite item is a Folder.

gatesToIgnore.description: Name of gate to be ignored.

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

lastModifiedOn.description: Gets the date on which gate is last ignored.

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

id.description: Identifier for the subscription input

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

values.description: This input should not be shown in the UI
An input text box should be shown
An password input box should be shown
A select/combo control should be shown
Checkbox should be shown(for true/false values)
A multi-line text area should be shown

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

dataType.description: Gets or sets the data type to validate.

values.description: Represents a value of true or false.

isRequired.description: Gets or sets if this is a required field.

maxLength.description: Gets or sets the maximum length of this descriptor.

maxValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

minLength.description: Gets or sets the minimum length of this descriptor.

minValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

pattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

patternMismatchErrorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error on pattern mismatch.

patternMismatchWarningMessage.description: Gets or sets the warning on pattern mismatch.

warningPattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

inputValues.description: The input values to return on input, and the result from the consumer on output.

resource.description: Subscription containing information about the publisher/consumer and the current input values

issueType.description: Issue type, for example error, warning or info.

healthPercent.description: Minimum percentage of the targets guaranteed to be healthy.

replyBy.description: Data when should be replied to mail.

PropertiesCollection.description: The class represents a property bag as a collection of key-value pairs. Values of all primitive types (any type with a `TypeCode != TypeCode.Object`) except for `DBNull` are accepted. Values of type Byte[], Int32, Double, DateType and String preserve their type, other primitives are retuned as a String. Byte[] expected as base64 encoded string.

count.description: The count of properties in the collection.

keys.description: The set of keys in the collection.

values.description: The set of values in the collection.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

isShared.description: Denotes if a variable group is shared with other project or not.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified.

modifiedOn.description: Gets date on which it got modified.

variableGroupProjectReferences.description: all project references where the variable group is shared with other projects.

variables.description: Gets and sets the dictionary of variables.

VariableGroupProjectReference.description: A variable group reference is a shallow reference to variable group.

description.description: Gets or sets description of the variable group.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the variable group.

projectReference.description: Gets or sets project reference of the variable group.

isReadOnly.description: Gets or sets if the variable is read only or not.

isSecret.description: Gets or sets as the variable is secret or not.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

alwaysRun.description: Gets or sets as the task always run or not.

checkConfig.description: Gets or sets the check configuration if check is injected as gate.

condition.description: Gets or sets the task condition.

continueOnError.description: Gets or sets as the task continue run on error or not.

definitionType.description: Gets or sets the task definition type. Example:- 'Agent', DeploymentGroup', 'Server' or 'ServerGate'.

enabled.description: Gets or sets as the task enabled or not.

environment.description: Gets or sets the task environment variables.

inputs.description: Gets or sets the task inputs.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the task.

overrideInputs.description: Gets or sets the task override inputs.

refName.description: Gets or sets the reference name of the task.

retryCountOnTaskFailure.description: Gets or sets the task retryCount.

taskId.description: Gets or sets the ID of the task.

timeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the task timeout.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the task.

id.description: Task identifier.

sourceReference.description: Gets or sets definition reference. e.g. {"project":{"id":"fed755ea-49c5-4399-acea-fd5b5aa90a6c","name":"myProject"},"definition":{"id":"1","name":"mybuildDefinition"},"connection":{"id":"1","name":"myConnection"}}

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.3.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.3.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.3' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.4.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.4.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.4' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.8.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.8.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.8' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.9.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.9.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.9' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.release: Grants the ability to read release artifacts, including folders, releases, release definitions and release environment.
scopes.vso.release_execute: Grants the ability to read and update release artifacts, including folders, releases, release definitions and release environment, and the ability to queue a new release.
scopes.vso.release_manage: Grants the ability to read, update and delete release artifacts, including folders, releases, release definitions and release environment and the ability to queue and approve a new release.
